data.eml:eml: Plant Species Recorded at Elluokrom in Ghana

These occurrence data were obtained from the Resource Management Support Centre of the Forestry Commission Ghana. The study area (Elluokrom) is at the Bia West District in the Western Region of Ghana and very close to the Bia Game Productive Reserve and also falls within the moist semi-deciduous forest type in Ghana. The area is characterized by high diversity of pioneer tree species and lies within decimal latitude and longitude 6.5273056 and -2.9319167 respectively. Timber species occurring within the Elluokrom area were recorded when encountered or observed.
